mapper.select: SELECT MTL_OD.MTL_OD_CODE AS mtlOdCode, MTL_OD.MTL_OD_DATE AS mtlOdDate, MTL_OD.USER_ID AS userId, MTL_OD.MTL_OD_STATUS AS mtlOdStatus, MTL_OD.CP_CODE AS cpCode, (SELECT SUM(COALESCE(MT.UNIT_PRICE, 0) * COALESCE(MTL_OD_DETAIL.QUANTITY, 0)) FROM MTL_OD_DETAIL LEFT JOIN MT ON MTL_OD_DETAIL.MT_CODE = MT.MT_CODE WHERE MTL_OD_DETAIL.MTL_OD_CODE = MTL_OD.MTL_OD_CODE) AS totalAmount FROM MTL_OD LEFT JOIN CP ON MTL_OD.CP_CODE = CP.CP_CODE WHERE MTL_OD.CP_CODE = #{cpCode}

SELECT MTL_OD.MTL_OD_CODE AS mtlOdCode, MTL_OD.MTL_OD_DATE AS mtlOdDate, MTL_OD.USER_ID AS userId, MTL_OD.MTL_OD_STATUS AS mtlOdStatus, MTL_OD.CP_CODE AS cpCode, CP.CP_NAME AS cpName, COALESCE(SUM(COALESCE(MT.UNIT_PRICE, 0) * COALESCE(MTL_OD_DETAIL.QUANTITY, 0)), 0) AS totalAmount FROM MTL_OD LEFT JOIN MTL_OD_DETAIL ON MTL_OD.MTL_OD_CODE = MTL_OD_DETAIL.MTL_OD_CODE LEFT JOIN MT ON MTL_OD_DETAIL.MT_CODE = MT.MT_CODE LEFT JOIN CP ON MTL_OD.CP_CODE = CP.CP_CODE WHERE #{cpCode} IS NULL OR MTL_OD.CP_CODE = #{cpCode} GROUP BY MTL_OD.MTL_OD_CODE, MTL_OD.MTL_OD_DATE, MTL_OD.USER_ID, MTL_OD.MTL_OD_STATUS, MTL_OD.CP_CODE, CP.CP_NAME

SELECT MTL_OD_DETAIL.MTL_OD_DETAIL_CODE AS mtlOdDetailCode, MTL_OD_DETAIL.MT_CODE AS mtCode, MT.MT_NAME AS mtName, MT.SPECIFICATION AS specification, MT.UNIT_PRICE AS unitPrice, MTL_OD_DETAIL.QUANTITY AS quantity, MT.COMM AS comm, MTL_OD.MTL_OD_DATE AS mtlOdDate FROM MTL_OD_DETAIL LEFT JOIN MT ON MTL_OD_DETAIL.MT_CODE = MT.MT_CODE LEFT JOIN MTL_OD ON MTL_OD.MTL_OD_CODE = MTL_OD_DETAIL.MTL_OD_CODE WHERE MTL_OD.CP_CODE = #{cpCode}

SELECT MTL_OD_DETAIL.MTL_OD_DETAIL_CODE AS mtlOdDetailCode, MTL_OD_DETAIL.MT_CODE AS mtCode, MT.SPECIFICATION AS specification, MT.UNIT_PRICE AS unitPrice, MTL_OD_DETAIL.QUANTITY AS quantity, MT.COMM AS comm, MTL_OD.MTL_OD_DATE AS mtlOdDate FROM MTL_OD_DETAIL LEFT JOIN MT ON MTL_OD_DETAIL.MT_CODE = MT.MT_CODE LEFT JOIN MTL_OD ON MTL_OD.MTL_OD_CODE = MTL_OD_DETAIL.MTL_OD_CODE WHERE MTL_OD.CP_CODE = #{cpCode}
SELECT MT.MT_CODE AS mtCode, MT.MT_NAME AS mtName, MT.SPECIFICATION AS specification, MT.UNIT_PRICE AS unitPrice FROM MT JOIN CP ON MT.MT_CODE = CP.MT_CODE WHERE CP.CP_CODE = #{cpCode}
SELECT DISTINCT CP_CODE AS cpCode, CP_NAME AS cpName, BUSINESS_NO AS businessNo, ADDRESS AS address, COMM AS comm, CP_TYPE AS cpType, MT_CODE AS mtCode FROM CP

SELECT MTL_OD.MTL_OD_CODE AS mtlOdCode, MTL_OD.MTL_OD_DATE AS mtSlOdDate, MTL_OD.USER_ID AS userId, MTL_OD.MTL_OD_STATUS AS mtlOdStatus, MTL_OD.CP_CODE AS cpCode, CP.CP_NAME AS cpName, (SELECT SUM(MT.UNIT_PRICE * MTL_OD_DETAIL.QUANTITY) FROM MTL_OD_DETAIL LEFT JOIN MT ON MTL_OD_DETAIL.MT_CODE = MT.MT_CODE WHERE MTL_OD_DETAIL.MTL_OD_CODE = MTL_OD.MTL_OD_CODE) AS totalAmount FROM MTL_OD LEFT JOIN CP ON MTL_OD.CP_CODE = CP.CP_CODE WHERE MTL_OD.MTL_OD_CODE = #{mtlOdCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MTL_OD ( MTL_OD_CODE, CP_CODE, MTL_OD_DATE, USER_ID, MTL_OD_STATUS ) VALUES ( 'MTL' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || MTL_OD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cpCode}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, '발주대기' )

INSERT INTO MTL_OD_DETAIL (
MTL_OD_DETAIL_CODE,
MTL_OD_CODE,
MT_CODE,
QUANTITY,
UNIT_PRICE,
TOTAL_AMOUNT,
MTL_OD_DATE
) VALUES ( 'MTLD' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyMMdd') || MTL_OD_DETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'MTL' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyMMdd') || MTL_OD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'MT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyMMdd' || MT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mtCode}, #{quantity}, #{unitPrice}, #{totalAmount}, SYSDATE )
